content:
I love bringing out all my precious treasures, big and small, when the Sunbeam is at its brightest.
Now that the Sunbeam's done for the day, it's time for them to head back inside.
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
(Yawn) Dusk is here,
Time for my seventh meal of the day.
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊
